      • getTotalRevenueByDate

        public double getTotalRevenueByDate(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                    java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                    java.lang.Integer enterprise)
        Returns the total revenue of a given enterprise between an interval of dates
        Parameters:
        start - Starting date
        end - Ending date
        enterprise - nif of enterprise
        Returns:
        0 if no invoices, or the sum of the valuesBeforeTax of all the invoices
